TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed InstrumentationManager extends System.Object
public ref class InstrumentationManager abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供方法，用于管理生命周期和管理用于分离式提供程序的模型。

span.span: Provides methods that manage the lifetime and the model used for decoupled providers.

summary.span: 注意：WMI .NET 库现在视为处于最终状态，且没有可用于会影响这些库的非安全性相关问题的进一步开发、增强或更新。

span.span: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.
The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

summary.span: 使提供程序实例可用于 WMI 基础结构。

span.span: Makes an instance of a provider available within the WMI infrastructure.
